problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC与△ADE是位似图形,且相似比为2:3,若△ABC的面积为18,则△ADE的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC and △ADE are similar figures, and the scale factor of similarity is N_0:N_1. If the area of ​​△ABC is N_2, then the area of ​​△ADE is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵△ABC与△ADE是位似图形,且相似比为2:3,∴△ADE与△ABC的面积比为(2:3)^{2}=4:9．∵△ABC的面积为18,∴△ADE的面积为:18×\frac{4}{9}=8．
故选:B．
